International Real Estate

We specialize in providing top-notch real estate options in highly desirable global destinations, guiding you through various investment programs for residency and citizenship.

About US

With over 25 years of institutional experience, Henley & Partners is by far the largest globally integrated residence and citizenship advisory firm in the world. Through the provision of bespoke residence and citizenship by investment solutions, we have helped thousands of individuals and families, their advisors, and many sovereign states to generate value. Our outstanding people and systems provide a world-class advisory service underpinned by strict confidentiality, data security, and limited transaction risk.
  • 60 +Offices worldwide
  • 25 +Years leading the sector
  • 40 +Investment migration options
  • 15 +Government advisory mandates
  • 25 000 +Clients advised
  • 15 billion+FDI raised

Top-Tier Citizenship Programs

VIEW ALL
  • Austria
    Austria has one of the world’s strongest passports. Prospective citizens are required to make a substantial contribution to the country’s economy.
    Austria citizenship
  • MALTA
    By making a significant direct investment, individuals can acquire citizenship through naturalization in recognition of exceptional services
    MALTA citizenship
  • Grenada
    Grenada has the only Caribbean citizenship program that holds an E-2 ligible to apply for a non-immigrant visa.
    GRENADA citizenship
  • Nauru
    Successful applicants in Nauru are provided with a secure second citizenship, along with opportunities for development and resilience to climate challenges.
    NAURU citizenship
  • MoNTENEGRO
    The Montenegro Citizenship by Investment Program was concluded on 31 December 2022. Contact us to find the best alternative citizenship for you and your family.
    MoNTENEGRO citizenship
  • Israel
    Citizenship by Naturalisation for Exceptional Services by Direct Investment. This process offers the world’s strictest due diligence standards and vetting.
    Israel citizenship
  • Turkey
    Gain citizenship through the Türkiye Citizenship by Investment Program to unlock opportunities in two continents - Asia and Europe.
    Turkey citizenship
  • Antigua and Barbuda
    Starting at just USD 230,000, Antigua and Barbuda's citizenship programs stand out as exceptionally competitive in the Caribbean region.
    Antigua and Barbuda citizenship

Top-Residence Programs

VIEW ALL
  • Spain
    The Spain Residence by Investment Program enables individuals to live, work and study in Spain, as well as travel visa-free in Europe's Schengen Area.
    Spain Residence
  • France
    Citizenship by Naturalisation for Exceptional Services by Direct Investment. This process offers the world’s strictest due diligence standards and vetting.
    France Residence
  • ItalY
    Italy has two residence options for investors seeking visa-free travel across Europe’s Schengen Area. No permanent stay is required. Investment is from EUR 250,000.
    ItalY Residence
  • Switzerland
    By making an annual tax contribution of at least CHF 250,000, individuals can secure residence in Switzerland through the Swiss Residence Program.
    Switzerland Residence
  • MoNTENEGRO
    The Montenegro Citizenship by Investment Program was concluded on 31 December 2022. Contact us to find the best alternative citizenship for you and your family.
    MoNTENEGRO Residence
  • Cosra RICA
    For just $150,000, investors in Costa Rica gain entry to dynamic urban centers, political security, and opportunities within the Central American market.
    Cosra RICA Residence
  • IRELAND
    The Türkiye Citizenship by Investment Program provides citizenship of a country with links to both Asia and Europe and access to the markets in both regions.
    IRELAND Residence
  • SINGAPORE
    Antigua and Barbuda offers one of the most competitive citizenship programs in the Caribbean. Options start from USD 230,000.
    SINGAPORE Residence

  • We advise on the best program for you and your family

    Once the relevant government agency has reviewed all documentation, it will conduct its own due diligence checks. If your application is successful, the government will send us an approval-in-principle letter, and you will be asked to fulfill any payment obligations (namely, make the investment, and/or pay the contribution, and/or settle any remaining fees). On receipt of the payments, the government will initiate your residence or citizenship documents.
